title: Tim and Sara
description: The victim of debilitating flashbacks, Tim is content to spend the rest of his life at Kirkbride, a state mental hospital. But his friend and fellow resident Sara is concerned that she has to save her soul before it's too late, and so she devises a plan to break them out of the hospital. Can Tim help his friend while holding onto what's left of his sanity?
author: E.D. Martin
